summary:
Feel learning spells too easy ?
Feel scrolls is useless ?
This mod raises prices them up.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=18]E[/size][size=15]NHANCED [/size][size=18]S[/size][size=15]PELL [/size][size=18]T[/size][size=15]OMES[/size][/center]

[center][color=white][b][size=5]Feel like too fast to learn new spells ? [/size][/b][/color][/center]
[center][color=white][b][size=5]Feel learning new spells not rewarding ?[/size][/b][/color][/center]

[center][color=white][b][size=5]Feel confuse why using scrolls while you have the spells ?[/size][/b][/color][/center]

[center][size=5]DETAILS[/size][/center]

This mod basically multiplies spell tomes prices by 3. And divide scrolls prices by 3.
It's like Spell Tome: Incinerate, in vanilla it costs 710 to learn. So i raise it to 2025.
I likely to scale prices based on perk trees. Fire is cheaper than Ice which is cheaper than Storm.
Also most Novice spells are 4x higher than normal. Because if i change from 33 gold to 99 gold is still cheap.
More details on ReadMe.

Wuunferth the Unliving, Farengar Secret-Fire, Falion , Nelacar, Sybille Stentor, Wylandriah, and Madena now sells much more Scrolls. So scrolls are supposed to be more viable for any class and jobs.

This include all magic school scrolls.

[center][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/center]

Just extract the files into your Skyrim data folder and enable them in Wyre Bash, NMM, MO, or Skyrim Launcher.
Enable Enhanced Spell Tomes - Dragonborn Patch.esp only if you have Dragonborn DLC. Or you will experience CTD.

Enable Enhanced Spell Tomes - Conjuration Madness Patch.esp only if you install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9331/?]Conjuration Madness[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3961371/?]MaiqtheAwesome[/url]. Otherwise CTD should happen.
Not a complex mod but worth trying if you bored of that silly Atronachs.

[center][size=5]NOTES[/size][/center]

- This mod uses no Script. Nothing will bloat your saves.
- This mod conflict with other mods which modifies Spell Tomes and Scrolls strings. So put it AFTER them.
- This mod also conflict with mods which modifies Wuunferth the Unliving, Farengar Secret-Fire, Falion , Nelacar, Sybille Stentor, Wylandriah, and Madena's merchant chest.
- Endorse if you like it :D
